# hasNotes

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has notes.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasNotes: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the calendar item has notes; otherwise it does not.

## Attaching Notes

- **notes**: The notes associated with the calendar item.
